resources.string: You are proceeding in my exhibition.

The contents in this app can only be unlocked in the exhibition \'The Emperor\'s New Saint\'. Unless you are already in Stift Klosterneuburg, get on the road from 9th of March to 17th of November. In order to use all functions of this app, please switch to the wifi \'DesKaisersNeuerHeiliger\' (password \'maximilian\').
With Bluetooth, we want to detect which exhibit is the closest to your position. Please turn on your bluetooth.
Open the app to get to know more about me and my exhibits.
